title: Low-Level Design for Front-End
description: Master component-level and code-level design patterns in front-end development. Learn how to design reusable components, manage state effectively, and build scalable front-end architectures that developers love to use.

modules.name: Component Design
modules.description: Design reusable, maintainable components with clean APIs and clear responsibilities

modules.name: State Management
modules.description: Patterns for managing state effectively in modern front-end applications

modules.name: Composition Patterns
modules.description: Advanced patterns for building flexible, composable UI components

modules.name: Front-End Architecture
modules.description: Module organization, dependency management, and scalable code structure

author: Sandeep Reddy Alalla
